EmailTemplate.subject: FW: Agreement (1357922378.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Harry, Thanks for your call sorry I missed you. I will stand by until hear from you, thanks for getting back to me. In terms of benefits you have 30 days to elect them from your “hire date” with MBO so it’s fine to decline them in enrollment and then reevaluate once your account is active. 401(k) contributions can be changed at any time. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, January 09, 2013 5:17 PM To: 'Harry Cubit' Subject: RE: Agreement Hi Harry, So nice speaking with you today, I have attached the redline agreement with suggest changes and reasons for change. There really was only one addition to the agreement in the non-compete section 5. Once I have your permission I could send this over to Todd with the following email: “Dear Todd, My name is Sara and I am a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me by Harry Cubit. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficiently and safely with their contract workforce <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. I have attached your standard agreement with our suggested changes, if you agree please send clean copy for signature, Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara” Let me know what you think. Thanks! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Harry Cubit [mailto:hcubit@comcast.net <mailto:hcubit@comcast.net>] Sent: Wednesday, January 09, 2013 4:23 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: FW: Agreement Sara, Thanks for the time! Here is the agreement I referred to…please provide any feedback to me. Thanks again!!! Best Regards, Harry Cubithcubit@comcast.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:hcubit@comcast.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>Mobile: 215-872-6030 From: Todd Cipperman [mailto:tcipperman@cipperman.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:tcipperman@cipperman.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Thursday, November 15, 2012 9:40 AM To: 'Harry Cubit' Subject: Agreement Harry, Attached is the Consulting Agreement. Take a look and give me a call with any questions. Todd From: Harry Cubit [mailto:hcubit@comcast.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:hcubit@comcast.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Tuesday, November 13, 2012 3:26 PM To: 'Todd Cipperman' Subject: RE: Quick FYI Todd, Do you have 30 minutes or so between 2:30-4:30 tomorrow Wednesday? Best Regards, Harry Cubithcubit@comcast.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:hcubit@comcast.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>Mobile: 215-872-6030Car From: Todd Cipperman [mailto:tcipperman@cipperman.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:tcipperman@cipperman.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Tuesday, November 13, 2012 2:32 PM To: 'Harry Cubit' Subject: RE: Quick FYI Can we do this by phone? Tomorrow afternoon and Thursday afternoon have some openings. Todd CippermanThe Cipperman Companies500 E. Swedesford RoadSuite 104Wayne, PA 19087www.cipperman.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&www.cipperman.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>tcipperman@cipperman.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&tcipperman@cipperman.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>(610) 687-5320 Cipperman Compliance Services provides CCO and compliance services to registered funds and money managers. We customize compliance solutions to fit your business: full or partial compliance outsourcing, consulting engagements, and tailored compliance tools. Cipperman & Company is a unique law firm devoted exclusively to the investment management industry. We work on a wide range of transactional and regulatory matters, but we concentrate on four core areas: Fund Formation, Distribution, Compliance, and Technology. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender by return email, and delete or destroy this and all copies of this message and all attachments. Any unauthorized disclosure, use, distribution, or reproduction of this message or any attachments is prohibited and may be unlawful. From: Harry Cubit [mailto:hcubit@comcast.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:hcubit@comcast.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2012 10:37 AM To: Todd Cipperman Subject: Quick FYI Todd, Quick fyi…I’m scheduled to see Brian Ferko today at 2 PM to begin the overall approach with his input at your office. I’ll swing by or I’m sure I’ll see you! Perhaps if your schedule allows, we can get together next week for breakfast/lunch and cover any high level topics so that I can incorporate into the eventual Statement of Work and Project Plan, plus expectations and logistics between now and into the 1st quarter 2013. On a side note, I’m in the process of scheduling a brief intro call between myself and Brian Fahey. As always, any thoughts are welcome! If I can help in any other way, please let me know. Best Regards, Harry Cubithcubit@comcast.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:hcubit@comcast.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1JMt05iy%2F%2BWL6rsjCGOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>Mobile: 215-872-6030Car
